issue.title: tuple_element_t<1, const span<int, 42>> is const int

discussion.p: As currently specified, it uses the cv-qualified partial specialization, which incorrectly adds cv-qualification to the element type.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4810.

blockquote.p: [Drafting note: The representation style for the newly added wording follows the new style for tuple_element<I, span<ElementType, Extent>>::type, which had recently been changed editorially.]
-1- Mandates: Extent != dynamic_extent && I < Extent is true.
